Articles.Content:
Hi,

 

After two years, there is still no proper 64 Bit-Mode, at a game what need so much memory ?
What is hapened ?
KSP does have a 64bit mode, look for the 64bit KSP exe file in the games folder.

6 minutes ago, sal_vager said:

KSP does have a 64bit mode, look for the 64bit KSP exe file in the games folder.

Sorry.

I use allready the 64 Bit mode, but he still crashes all the time.

The 32 Bit mode crashes also because memory.

I have 16Gigs in my system and allway at least 6 to 8 free. Graficcard inserds 4 Gigs. should be enough.

I have eject all Mods and still crashes all the time. Dont tell me I have to start at zero...

Ahh I see.

64bit doesn't help with non memory related crashes, it only makes more memory available to the application.

There is work being done on the crashing, so the next update should be more stable
